ELISN.MX.summary: Elis SA provides linen and work wear rental, laundry, and hygiene and well-being services in France, the United Kingdom, Ireland, Central Europe, Scandinavia, Eastern Europe, Southern Europe, and Latin America. The company offers work uniforms for the hospitality, healthcare, ultra-clean, beauty, industry, agrifood, and other sectors; automatic clothing dispenser systems; and linens for hospitality and healthcare sectors. It also provides washroom hygiene services, such as hand washing and wiping, toilet paper dispensers, air purification, washroom hygiene, and feminine hygiene. In addition, the company offers infectious medical waste management services primarily for the healthcare sector; equipment for reception areas; floor protection services, such as mat rental and maintenance; beverage dispensers; and pest control services. It primarily serves the hospitality, industry, trade, and healthcare sectors. Elis SA was founded in 1883 and is headquartered in Saint-Cloud, France.
